div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1662 Semenood (mod. Samannûd; anc. (957) Sebennytis), 20 km. SW of El Man- sûra), 1907 Burial: 4th cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 60 AR Sabaces: tetradr. (imit. of Athenian type) Disposition: all but 5 melted down Mavrogordato, NC 1908, p. 204 Newell, NNM 82 (1938), p. 64
